t: Is Blue Hawk a Lowes brand?

t: Blackhawk (tools) - Wikipedia
s: January 1, 2024 - Blackhawk is an American brand of hand tools. It is currently a sub-brand of the Proto division of the Stanley Black & Decker. Blackhawk Manufacturing was founded in 1919 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin as a subsidiary of the American Grinder Company (later named Applied Power Corporation).
